title: Company-Specific Instruction Types
description: Standard instruction types for corporate communications and documentation

company_intro.template: <<Write a company introduction using this prompt: ([{<{description}>}]). Requirements: Use {tone} tone. {includeValues, select, true{Include company mission, vision, and values.} false{Focus on company overview only.}}>>
company_intro.description: Generates standardized company introductions with optional mission/vision/values

summary.template: <<Create a business summary using this prompt: ([{<{description}>}]). Style: Corporate executive summary focusing on key achievements and metrics.>>
summary.description: Company-specific summary type that focuses on business achievements

testimonial.template: <<Generate {count} testimonials using this prompt: ([{<{description}>}]). Format each as a quote with attribution including name and company role.>>
testimonial.description: Creates customer testimonials with professional attribution
